system.description:
You know how to quickly turn extraneous materials into high-tech marvels. As a bonus action, you can create one of the following items:

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.KxGLJTVAmYbVBMkP]{Chemical Detector}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.HwcSVRqelPcs2hEh]{Geiger Counter}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.UWHfwzZFrPlw5noc]{Chemical Light Stick}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.i9VrYktQXYvfDqn5]{Spray Adhesive}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.riDOA205HuPqS84f]{Cryospray}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.UjXugmQpIj9gJGRm]{Spray Paint} (1 use)
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.nrnaePjuFoFXLv0f]{Duct Tape} (30 feet)
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.zCA6MRnepRJGrDoj]{Zero-friction Lubricant}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.z8L02F4LbnaQqu6V]{Flashlight}

Items produced in this way lose effectiveness after 1 hour. You can use this feature to create a number of items equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.
